venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's Steakhouse in Auburn every Thursday night, from 7pm to 9pm. An emcee reads the questions, and each team submits an answer, bidding a number of points each time. The team with the most points wins!(Usually a gift certificate to Chuck's)
item.how_to_find_us: I will give out my cell # closer to the event. Plus, I will have small meetup sign.
item.name: Trivia at chuck's
